pkgmetadata.longdescription: Connect to 'AWS Athena' using R 'AWS SDK' 'paws' ('DBI' Interface) // Designed to be compatible with the 'R' package 'DBI' (Database Interface) when connecting to Amazon Web Service ('AWS') Athena https://aws.amazon.com/athena/. To do this the 'R' 'AWS' Software Development Kit ('SDK') 'paws' https://github.com/paws-r/paws is used as a driver.
